entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM NDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 2:30 PM NDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: -1.8°C
Wind: N 32 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries changing to freezing drizzle or flurries near midnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 20 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
